The footnote specifies that "the Authority shall declare the list of 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks O /st September every calendar year based onthe Balance Sheet size as declared in their Annual reports The 1 year Marginal Cost offundg based Lending Rate (MCLR) of the 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks shall be taken at the start of every Quarter. 3_ Accordingly, Authority hereby declare the 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks along with their one year MCLR (rate of interest), applicable as on Ist October, 2021. 4 The rates for 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks are as below: Year MCLR Rate applicable for the period Sr. No. Bank's Name in % 01.10.2021 to (As on 01.10.2021) 31.12.2021 1 _ State Bank of India 7.00 7.21% p.a_ 2 _ HDFC Bank 7.20 (i.e. average of 5 Scheduled 3 ICICI Bank 7.25 Commercial Banks) Plus 1.25% 4 Bank of Baroda 7.35 5_ PNB 7.25 5_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
